name: Diviner
description:
You are a child who has been snatched up by the clergy and locked in a small room in a church rectory, forced to go without food or human contact.

You are commanded to pray for omens from God to help stave off a calamity coming to your small village.

Can you divine enough omens to save your village? Does it even deserve to be saved?

" A tricky Twine-based fantasy puzzle to save your town while fasting in solitary confinement. " - San Francisco Bay Area Interactive Fiction Group
